JOB DESCRIPTION: 0 - 2+ Year s experience in software development.      Candidate to know database concepts, search and sort algorithms, and recursive algorithm and data structures like linked list, queue, stack, trees, etc. Knowledge of database and strong programming skills is a must.      Candidates with software development experience and they would be required to write code in the C/C++ environment.      Candidates must have the ability to work independently and as a team with or without direct supervision.      Knowledge of advanced searching algorithms and basic AI would be a plus.
